snippet: Mr. Kasliwal’s designs were sold in the Metropolitan Museum of Art, collected by European royals and prized by celebrities, who were drawn to his sometimes monumental gems.
abstract: Munnu Kasliwal, jeweler whose designs were sold in the Metropolitan Museum of Art, collected by European royals and prized by celebrities, dies at age 54.
lead_paragraph: Mr. Kasliwal’s designs were sold in the Metropolitan Museum of Art, collected by European royals and prized by celebrities, who were drawn to his sometimes monumental gems.

headline.seo: Munnu Kasliwal, a Favorite Jeweler of Connoisseurs, Dies at 54
headline.main: Munnu Kasliwal, a Favorite Jeweler of Connoisseurs, Dies at 54
headline.print_headline: Munnu Kasliwal, 54, Jeweler for the Elite
